title: The Beast Slayer
body:
The Beast slayer should be a Jungle mainly or a less preferred role of top.
This is as his abilities allow him to kill monsters extremely quickly however at the cost of high mana.

HP550+ 87.2
MP341+54
AD61+3.73
Atk Speed. 0.671 +0.008
Armor 22.1+3.1
MR 27.1 +2.1
Speed 345

Passive- Beast Slayer.
The Beast slayer has no remorse against his foes.  Strikes always deal 1/1.5/2/2.5 of the enemies current HP as bonus Physical Damage.
On neutral monsters, this damage is increased to 3/4/5/6% Current HP damage as TD instead. Killing a Large Monster or Enemy Champion increases attack speed by 2%. Stacks 10 times for Monsters. All lost on death. however on champion take downs (assists don't count)
the stacks count as a different subgroup and it is not lost on death.

Q: Flatten the Weak. 105/120/135/150/165MP 15/14.5/14/13.5/13 seconds.
Jumps high and slams back ground on a enemy. Dealing aoe damage of 40/90/140/190/240+ 60% AD Physical damage and stunning them all for
1 second. On Non-Champion units, this breaks them down completely, stun lasts 3 seconds and the damage is increased to 70/130/190/250/310+90%AD and 10% of their MAX HP. Maximum of 200/250/300/350/400 Damage for Max HP damage on Creeps.

W: Show them who is boss. 110/120/130/140/150mp 21/20/19/18/17.
Picks up the enemy and slams them back on the ground after selecting the target location over 2 seconds. Dealing 11/14/17/20/23% Max HP as physical damage +20/30/40/50/60+30%AD Physical Damage. 
On Neutrals, this completely destroy their spirit to fight. Causing them to lose 25/30/35/40/45% Attack speed and 10/15/20/25/30 AD for 4 seconds. As well as stunning for 1.5 seconds after they land on the ground.  Maximum HP damage on creeps are 220/280/340/400/460 Damage.

E: Slayers Guard. 65/80/95/110/125MP 30/27/24/21/18 seconds.
Passive: Damage from Creeps are reduced by 2/3/4/5/6%
Active: The Slayer Raises his guard, increasing sight range by 10/15/20/25/30%.  Movement speed by 10/15/20/25/30% and becoming immune to the next incoming spell. As well as this, he becomes completely immune to the Creeps damage for 1/1.75/2.5/3.25/4 seconds. Not counter on Epic Monsters. Damage reduced by 20% for the duration instead.

R: No Match for me! 200/175/150MP. 100/90/80 seconds.
Passive: Every third strike deals 50/65/80% of the enemies Armor as Bonus Physical Damage. On creeps this deals 2/2.5/3 times their Armor as Bonus MAGIC damage.
Active: Instantly CHarges to the enemy within 800/1000/1200 range but outside 375 range and tackles them pushing another 800/1000/1200 + the remaining charging  range away, Pushing them over terrain if possible. Dealing 200/300/400+60/85/110%AD Physical Damage contact and for each terrain hit/ passed, deals a bonus 100/140/180+40%AD Physical Damage. And stuns for 1/1.5/2 seconds every time a wall is passed.


How to play. Play him in jungle, it is very easy as long as you keep an eye on the Mana meter. Easy ganks with ult, just run up behind and push them all the way under your lane turret and is Flatten the Weak followed by Show them who is boss to secure a easy kill.

In teamfights just flash from behind and push the enemy ADC or Main damage outpu into your team so they get slaughtered, but do be aware they must be outside of a certain range and not right in front.

Counter tips. JUST GET ARMOR. he cannot do much shit to you if you  have armor. But if you dont, prepare to get melted. 
Be aware of his mana amont. His spells cost alot of mana.

replies.body:
They took Teemo's increased sight range from him for a reason. OP.

Also the rest of the kit is OP. 

You say to get armor against him but he has an ability that punishes you for doing so? It just seems a little counter-intuitive.
BUT, that bonus damage is still blocked by armor.
There shouldn't be bonus damage at all if his weakness is meant to be armor IMO.
